009package imagingbook.common.geometry.line;
010
011//import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import java.util.Locale;
014
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016
017/**
018 * This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., 
019 * x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius.
020 * It is a specialization (subclass) of {@link AlgebraicLine}.
021 * Instances are immutable. Reference point is (0,0).
022 */
023public class HessianLine extends AlgebraicLine {
024        
025//      private final double angle;
026//      private final double radius;
027        
028        // static factory methods ----------------------------------------
029        
030        public static HessianLine from(Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2) {
031                return new HessianLine(AlgebraicLine.from(p1, p2));
032        }
033        
034        // constructors --------------------------------------------------
035
036        public HessianLine(double angle, double radius) {
037                super(Math.cos(angle), Math.sin(angle), -radius);       // = A, B, C
038        }
039        
040        public HessianLine(double A, double B, double C) {
041                super(A, B, C);                                         // creates a normalized line
042//              this.angle = Math.atan2(this.B, this.A);
043//              this.radius = -this.C;                  // ... / Math.sqrt(sqr(this.a) + sqr(this.b));
044        }
045        
046        // TODO: what is this for?
047        public HessianLine(AlgebraicLine L) {
048//              this(L.A, L.B, L.C);
049                super(L.getParameters());
050        }
051        
052        public double getAngle() {
053//              return this.angle;
054                return Math.atan2(this.B, this.A);
055        }
056        
057        public double getRadius() {
058//              return this.radius;
059                return -this.C;
060        }
061        
062        
063        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
064        
065        @Override
066        public String toString() {
067                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s <angle = %.3f, radius = %.3f>",
068                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), getAngle(), getRadius());
069        }
070
071}
